title: contrib/ltr LTRScoringModel.hasParams() method is unused
description: The method is unused and can't foresee use of it in custom classes. However, the presence of the method complicates wrapping/delegating models such as in SOLR-11250 - hence the motivation to just remove the unused method.

SOLR-11603: Remove unused (public) LTRScoringModel.hasParams() method.
